content.question: Sentiments of business leaders and politicians like that expressed in the excerpt most likely contributed to which of the following?

choices.label: Widespread acceptance of moral reform movements
The creation of diplomatic ties with foreign nations
A sharp decline in immigration from European countries
A fostering of new religious understanding

content.answer: The creation of diplomatic ties with foreign nations

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
